content:
Hello! I am not sure if this is the right place to ask for installation help, so please direct me if so.
I have successfully installed Zulip on my local machine following this guide. However, when I try to do so over SSH on a remote VPS server, I consistently get an error. I spent like 5 hours googling and trying to solve it, but I have not succeeded yet. So maybe you could direct me to the solution?

On the remote I have Ubuntu 14.04 and I have run sudo apt-get update.
I have completed all the previous steps, but on vagrant up step, I am getting:
There was an error executing ["sudo", "/usr/local/bin/vagrant-lxc-wrapper", "lxc-start", "-d", "--name", "zulip_default_1489850011287_47815"]
Hi Samat, i think #provision help stream would be the best place to ask for dev environment help, also please post a full traceback of the error.
@Tommy Ip oh, I am sorry, I confused the stream. Should I just copy paste this post there?
Can I also somehow delete this topic?
Dont worry about here, just move it to provision help and add a traceback
@Tommy Ip Alright, thank you!
